title: Microwave rhubarb chutney
ingredients: ['550g (1 1/4 lb) fresh rhubarb, trimmed and sliced', '225g (8 oz) onions, finely diced', '225ml (8 fl oz) white wine vinegar', '225g (8 oz) light brown soft sugar', '1 pinch salt', '2.5cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, grated', '1 dessertspoon ground ginger', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '110g (4 oz) sultanas']
